Title: New customer make credit card account
Steps:
1-Go to the sign-up page
2-Enter valid user details
3-click sign-up
4-Make a purchase same day

Title: New customer with a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the sign-up page
2-Enter valid user details
3-click sign-up
4-Make a purchase same day
Excepted results: Apply 15% discount with message "You are not allowed to use the coupon because you are a new user"

Title: Existing customer without a loyalty card and without a coupon
Precondition:
1-customer has an existing account
2-He does not have a loyalty card or a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the login page
2-Enter email and password
3-click login 
4-Make a purchase

Title: Existing customer with loyalty card and without coupon
Precondition:
1-customer has an existing account
2-He has a loyalty card but does not have a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the login page
2-Enter email and password
3-click login
4-Make a purchase

Title: Existing customer with loyalty card and coupon
Precondition:
1-customer has an existing account
2-He has a loyalty card and a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the login page
2-Enter email and password
3-click login
4-Make a purchase

Title: Existing customer without a loyalty card and with a coupon
Precondition:
1-customer has an existing account
2-He does not have a loyalty card and has a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the login page
2-Enter email and password
3-click login
4-Make a purchase

Title: Existing customer with a valid loyalty card and expired coupon
Precondition:
1-customer has an existing account
2-He does not have a loyalty card and has a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the login page
2-Enter email and password
3-click login
4-Make a purchase
Excepted results: Apply the 15% discount with the message "This coupon has expired"

Title: Existing customer with an expired loyalty card and a valid coupon
Precondition:
1-customer has an existing account
2-He does not have a loyalty card and has a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the login page
2-Enter email and password
3-click login
4-Make a purchase
Excepted results: Apply the 20% discount with the message "This loyalty card has expired"

Title: Existing customer with an expired loyalty card and coupon
Precondition:
1-customer has an existing account
2-He does not have a loyalty card and has a coupon
Steps:
1-Go to the login page
2-Enter email and password
3-click login
4-Make a purchase
Excepted results: Message "This loyalty card and coupon has expired"
